= Team Meeting =
**05 DECEMBER 2016** / 10:00 AM / CONFERENCE ROOM
== Attendees ==
Guillaume, Caty, Ludovic
== Agenda ==
=== Problems we had ===
1. Not all the users are used to the new Cloud. 1. Electric failure last week.
== Notes ==
* Guillaume had to leave before the end of the meeting
== Action Items ==
* Plan a formation for users * Buy an engine-generator
== Next Meeting Agenda ==
* Define objectives regarding the sales of the product SUPER-1.
